name: WE.JAM_SwarmCrash
description:
CONTROLS:

  • wasd to move
  • Shift to sprint
  • Space to jump (double jump)
  • Lmb to eat
  • R to restart
  • esc to quit

STORY:

You are stranded in the wild west. You are an Alien. Find your Ship to escape.

GAMEPLAY:

Eat slime bottles or people to replicate. Some humans are armed and will open fire on sight so be careful. If you get shot an other slime in the horde takes control.

DISCLAIMER:

I did end up using the art asset meant for prototyping  in the submission, because i ran out of time to replace them. The level is also just a heavily modified version of an asset pack demo. I focused on the animation and game mechanics (Crowd Control, AI)
